docs.snippet: A Utah lawmaker introduced a bill that would rename the state’s most scenic route in honor of the president. An opponent has suggested an unusual amendment.

headline.print_headline: Street Fight Over a Utah Highway Name
headline.main: In Utah, It’s the Donald J. Trump Highway vs. the ‘Stormy Daniels Rampway’

docs.snippet: U.S. regulators intervened in a possible purchase of the chip maker Qualcomm by an Asian company, Broadcom. It was a rare public intervention in a pending deal.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Stalls Takeover Bid By Broadcom Over Security
headline.main: Trump Administration Stalls Largest Tech Merger in New Sign of Protectionism

docs.snippet: Conor Lamb shows that it can be done.

headline.print_headline: How a Democrat Succeeds in Trump Country
headline.main: How a Democrat Succeeds in Trump Country

docs.snippet: The Latest on President Donald Trumpx (all times local):

headline.print_headline: The Latest: Trump Calls on Mexico to Stop Flow of Immigrants
headline.main: The Latest: Trump Calls on Mexico to Stop Flow of Immigrants

docs.snippet: Trump administration officials said Monday they're crafting a new legislative package aimed at closing immigration "loopholes," hours after the president called on Republicans in Congress to immediately pass a border bill using the "Nuclear Option...

headline.print_headline: Trump Pushes Republicans to Use 'Nuclear Option' on Border
headline.main: Trump Pushes Republicans to Use 'Nuclear Option' on Border

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump said on Sunday that there will be no deal to legalize the status of young adult immigrants called Dreamers and he said the U.S.-Mexico border is becoming more dangerous.

headline.print_headline: Trump Says DACA Deal for Young Immigrants Is Off
headline.main: Trump Says DACA Deal for Young Immigrants Is Off

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump was voicing concern about Amazon.com Inc when he commented about the company on Twitter on Thursday, but the administration has no action dealing with the company at this time, the White House said.

headline.print_headline: Trump 'Has No Actions' Against Amazon: White House
headline.main: Trump 'Has No Actions' Against Amazon: White House

docs.snippet: The peculiar, painful limbo of David Shulkin shows how the president often handles personnel matters: publicly, hoping the employee will leave instead of forcing an ouster.

headline.print_headline: Awkward Silence on V.A. Chief From Man With Catchphrase of ‘You’re Fired’
headline.main: Trump, Famous for ‘You’re Fired,’ Offers V.A. Chief Only Awkward Silence

docs.snippet: The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.
Republican Gov. Paul LePage, who's known for his brash comments, called the federal judge who allowed a lawsuit against President Donald Trump an "imbecile." Four times, no less.

headline.print_headline: Governor: Judge Who Allowed Trump Lawsuit Is an 'Imbecile'
headline.main: Governor: Judge Who Allowed Trump Lawsuit Is an 'Imbecile'
